changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.comment: 节点表新增删除时路径、created_by和updated_by
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}node` ADD COLUMN `deleted_path` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '删除时的路径' AFTER `creator`, ADD COLUMN `created_by` bigint(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建者' AFTER `is_banned`, ADD COLUMN `updated_by` bigint(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最后修改者' AFTER `created_by`
